prompts: Create a cheerful Pokemon that thrives in sunny weather and has a flower-like appearance.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the essence of spring with vibrant colors and a friendly expression.
Generate a whimsical flower Pokemon that has green leaves and a bright yellow face.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a playful sunflower, with big eyes and a wide smile.
Imagine a grass-type Pokemon that dances in the sunlight and has a cute, rounded body.
Design a Pokemon with a sunny disposition and features of a flower and plant.
Show me a Pokemon inspired by nature, with bright colors and a playful personality.
